channel.title: 彭博-市场
channel.description: 这是一个追踪彭博-市场news的种子

item.title: 巴拿马运河避免了一场可能颠覆全球经济的最严重的航运危机，但海洋生物和拉美国家的饮用水供应却为此付出了代价。
item.description:
The Panama Canal has avoided the worst of a shipping crunch that threatened to upend the global economy — but at a cost to marine life and the Latin American country’s supplies of potable water. https://t.co/fpnM1arjrc

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 15, 2024

item.title: 欧元区的职位空缺在去年年底继续下降，2023 年第四季度达到 2.7%，创下两年多来的新低。
item.description:
Job vacancies in the euro area continued to drop at the end of last year, touching a more than two-year low of 2.7% in the fourth quarter of 2023 https://t.co/mEQK4PYoN1

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 15, 2024

item.title: 欧洲央行管理委员会成员鲍里斯-武伊契奇（Boris Vujcic）表示，欧元区经济的大幅下滑可能会加快欧洲央行降低借贷成本的速度，但这一进程何时开始并不重要。
item.description:
A major stumble in the euro-zone economy could increase the speed at which the ECB lowers borrowing costs, though not when the process begins, according to Governing Council member Boris Vujcic https://t.co/g5dbsrIjRQ

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 15, 2024

item.title: 乌克兰立法者计划审议一项允许监狱囚犯参战的法案，因为国家正在想方设法增加前线的人手
item.description:
Ukrainian lawmakers plan to consider a bill that would allow prison inmates to join the war effort as the nation seeks ways to bolster manpower on the front lines https://t.co/zFS6DbbDJ9

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 15, 2024

item.title: 欧盟将把与埃及的关系升级为 "战略伙伴关系"，此举可能为这个北非国家带来数十亿欧元的资金和投资
item.description:
The EU is set to upgrade its relationship with Egypt to the status of a “strategic partnership,” a move that could trigger billions of euros of funding and investments for the North African country https://t.co/tLNN7fuIvJ

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 15, 2024

item.title: 美国 2 月份工业生产几乎没有增长，原因是温和的天气抑制了公用事业需求，但刺激了工厂产出的回升
item.description:
US industrial production barely rose in February as milder weather damped utility demand but spurred a snapback in factory output https://t.co/1VtAcCZ8YZ

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 15, 2024

item.title: 本期 "埃隆公司 "播客直播在 2024 年 SXSW 大会上录制，我们将讨论埃隆-马斯克迁居德克萨斯州对该州以及马斯克本人产生的影响。
item.description:
On this live episode of the Elon, Inc. podcast, recorded at SXSW 2024, we talk about how Elon Musk's move to Texas has impacted the state — and Musk himself https://t.co/05VZEaEWM7 pic.twitter.com/BJ2YudShtO

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 15, 2024

item.title: 高盛首席执行官大卫-所罗门（David Solomon）表示，他对今年持乐观态度，因为他的公司有望从资本市场活动的反弹中获得收益。
item.description:
Goldman Sachs Chief Executive Officer David Solomon said he’s optimistic about this year as his firm expects to reap gains from a rebound in capital-markets activity https://t.co/6OIxkyR6m1

item.title: 以色列通货膨胀率连续第六个月下降，部分原因是对哈马斯的战争导致消费低迷

Israel’s inflation decelerates for a sixth straight month, partly because of a consumption slump induced by the war against Hamas https://t.co/FO0PkI6G2A

item.title: 摩根大通（JPMorgan）的分析师认为，瑞银更多元化的财富管理风险和业务组合使其比美国同行摩根士丹利更具吸引力。
item.description:

item.title: 胡塞叛军在红海袭击货船，导致全球贸易中断，这为非洲提供了机遇。非洲与机遇擦肩而过

item.title: @danmurtaugh 写道：中国核电的快速发展虽然没有像风能和太阳能发电量激增那样广受赞誉，但也同样令人印象深刻。
item.description:
China's rapid expansion of nuclear power has been just as impressive, although not as widely heralded, as its surging installations of wind and solar, writes @danmurtaugh https://t.co/jNj8fxErxE

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 15, 2024

item.title: 法国不仅仅是奢侈品和软实力的国度。随着国防成为欧洲的必备品，法国已成为世界第二大武器出口国

item.title: 股市逐步走高。本周股市会以上涨结束吗？现在就加入彭博监控，与 @TomKeene @ScarletFu @LisaMateoTV @BigBarrSports 一起在 YouTube 上观看直播：
item.description:
Stocks are inching higher. Will equities finish the week with a gain?
Join Bloomberg Surveillance with @TomKeene @ScarletFu @LisaMateoTV @BigBarrSports.
Watch LIVE on YouTube right now: https://t.co/Hb0h6yunuG

— Bloomberg Radio (@BloombergRadio) March 15, 2024
